short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the chrome extention for the AI-Proctor system. Find more information about the system at  https://www.ai-proctor.com/

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is for the AI-Proctor system integrated with Moodle. It opens a channel between the student browser and the instructor only during the exam. It also converts Chrome to full screen mode during the exam. The extension is one part of the system. The other part is the AI-Proctor desktop application. Please download it. Good luck in your exams!
